definition: abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China

sentences.english: Opposition politicians blame the government, saying a river project has reduced farmland.
sentences.chinese: 反對黨的政治人物指責政府河川的計劃使得農地減少。

sentences.english: Rivers and lakes might dry up in some places, and glaciers might melt.
sentences.chinese: 某些地方的河川跟湖泊可能幹涸，冰河也可能溶化。

sentences.english: In Hualien, you can see the train runs under the river.
sentences.chinese: 在花蓮，你可以看到火車從河川底下穿過。

sentences.english: Part of the glacier is breaking into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 一部分冰河川衝進了海洋。

sentences.english: The sharing of bounty reflects the culture of people grateful for the river that binds them together.
sentences.chinese: 這種盛情款待反映人們對河川地聯繫如何心存感激。

sentences.english: I sat down on a log at the head of the island.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在島端的一根圓木上，望着黑暗中的河川。

sentences.english: In this paper a nonuniform coefficient for quantifying the nonuniformity in annual distribution of stream flows is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種河川徑流年內分配不均勻性的定量化方法。

sentences.english: The binder(mortar)-to-aggregate ratio needs to be more than 36% for river aggregate to making sidewalk pavement.
sentences.chinese: 若河川石應用於人行道上，漿骨比要36%以上方可。

sentences.english: The dragon king rules the rivers and protects the villages through the tough winter months.
sentences.chinese: 龍王主宰著河川，並且保護各個村落安然度過寒冬。

sentences.english: We must take into account the possibility of contaminating the river.
sentences.chinese: 我們應把污染河川的可能性列入考慮。

sentences.english: Who laced and filleted the earth so fine with rivers like green ribbons smaragdine?
sentences.chinese: 誰用翠玉緞帶般的河川把地球編織得這樣好看？

sentences.english: Time is flowing rivers, happiness belongs to the people.
sentences.chinese: 時間是流淌的河川，幸福屬於順流而下者。

sentences.english: A torrent of water swept down the river.
And streams and rivers freed from irons of ice.
sentences.chinese: 溪澗和河川掙開了冰結的鐐銬。

sentences.english: Forty percent of the waterways have become undrinkable.
sentences.chinese: 百分之四十的河川水道已變得不可飲用。

sentences.english: Rivers are short, useful for power generation but not for navigation .
sentences.chinese: 河川短促，水力蘊藏豐富，適合發電但不利航行。

definition: Pingchuan district of Baiyin city 白銀市|白银市[Bai2 yin2 shi4], Gansu
